title: Trump: 'America is Truly a Nation in Mourning'
description:
(4 Oct 2017) U.S. President Donald Trump somberly thanked first responders who rushed to help after the mass shooting in Las Vegas, telling them Wednesday that "America is truly a nation in mourning."


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/8c1548e30328851d06fc62df604b08e4 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
